data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lin, Yucheng, Li, Shuqiang, Jaeger, Peter (2014): Four new spider species of the family Theridiosomatidae (Arachnida, Araneae) from caves in Laos. ZooKeys 391: 75-102, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.391.7161, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.391.7161
